Gordon,
   Thank for your feedback. I tried the seeds with status code -50 =
agains. I can fetch most of them. 

Also When I reduced the number of seeds=
 from 200,000 to 100,000, the number of seeds with -50 status code in seeds=
-reports.txt was reduced significantly.

> In recent versions of our recomm=
ended DecideRule-based scope 
> configurations, we include the Prerequisite=
AcceptDecideRule in the >last  position, so that even if other changes put =
in place rule-out > needed URLs, they are again ruled-in at the end. Does y=
our scope >retain this rule in the last position?

Not in the last position=
. After PrerequisiteAcceptDecideRule, A google filter is added. Does it cau=
se the problem?

----
       <newObject name=3D"robotsDNS" class=3D"org.arc=
hive.crawler.deciderules.PrerequisiteAcceptDecideRule">
          </newObje=
ct>
          <newObject name=3D"sSkipGoogleSiteSearch" class=3D"org.archiv=
e.crawler.deciderules.MatchesFilePatternDecideRule">
            <string na=
me=3D"decision">REJECT</string>
            <string name=3D"use-preset-patt=
ern">Custom</string>
            <string name=3D"regexp">https?://(.*?\.)?g=
oogle\.com/(search|cse|images|mail|videosearch|news|products|scholar|books|=
financ
e|translate_t|blogsearch|lh|account|support|maps)[^a-z0-9_].*</strin=
g>
          </newObject>
---

> > Hello,

or each site, the max hops is set to 2.

i checked "seed-reports.txt"

h status code "-50" is 74681.
> 
> It is likely that some change to your sc=
ope rules is preventing 
> necessary prerequisite URIs (DNS, robots) from b=
eing fetched, for some 
> URIs.
> 
> I would pick one of the seeds that fai=
ls and launch a crawl with just 
> it, studying the logs for all hints abou=
t what steps are tried. Does 
> that same seed work with the default settin=
gs bundled with Heritrix 
> 1.14.4? With the default settings and *only* yo=
ur max-hops=3D2 change? 
> With your settings with max-hops=3D3?
> 
> In re=
cent versions of our recommended DecideRule-based scope 
> configurations, =
we include the PrerequisiteAcceptDecideRule in the last 
> position, so tha=
t even if other changes put in place rule-out needed

n ruled-in at the end. Does your scope retain this
